name: Sticky Jo
description:
The game about joining together, you start with all single Jos. If 2 single Jos join each other, they will become double Jos and now player can control all single Jos and double Jos. Join more Jos and expand the network to Triple Jos and so on.

Control :

  • MOVEMENT -- Arrow Keys or WASD 
  • UNDO -- Z
  • REDO --X
  • RESTART -- R
